title: 5 storage mistakes that kill SSD endurance faster than gaming
full_text: 5 storage mistakes that kill SSD endurance faster than gaming. Stop these habits right now if you want your SSD to have a long life. Most people probably don't think about exhausting their SSD's lifespan. The NAND flash used to store data on SSDs has a finite number of write cycles. On most gaming PCs, this isn't a big concern, as… [+6544 chars]
